name: Railroads & Catacombs
description:
Make sure you are ready to face those sinister creatures.
Bosses will end your pathetic lives with no hesitation.



Position yourself strategically, either getting in close for a fatal strike against your opponents or maintaining distance to cast devastating spells.



The locomotive is connected to 12 different types of carriages, it’s the only sanctuary in this world of madness. Get away from this ominous land, find a safe place.



Assemble and oversee your crew, picking from the 5 classes that excel in combat or train-related tasks.


Pairing two of the six combat styles, there are more than 120 card upgrades.
Find your meta combinations, so your venture may last longer...
